topic.title: PROFESSIONAL REGISTRATION ENTRY IDENTIFIER (PATHOLOGY TEST REQUESTED BY)
topic.shortdesc: PROFESSIONAL REGISTRATION ENTRY IDENTIFIER (PATHOLOGY TEST REQUESTED BY) is the registration identifier allocated by an ORGANISATION for the CARE PROFESSIONAL who requested the pathology test.
